reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easier than going to the store.
reviews.author: Sarah
reviews.content: When my original Apple Watch started having problems, I thought I was going to have to go wait in store to buy a new watch but when I found this one on Amazon, I thought it would be too good to be true. This watch is exactly the same as what you would buy in store, but without the wait. I have always liked this Apple Watch because I've never needed the newest one. The functionality, sound quality, Watch quality, and weight were always some of my favorite things about it. I love that this one came with the more cream/rose colored band. But for work I usually just used my old band so I don’t damage the new one. If you want an Apple Watch at a good price and don’t need the newest one, I would suggest this one. I like the price of it a lot better too.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 26, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
reviews.author: AY
reviews.content: Does everything it advertises. The watch came brand new, no scratches or anything. Only thing is, the battery life is not the best. However, if you're not using it extensively like tracking workouts every hour, I'm sure you will be fine.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 5, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch
reviews.author: Very happy with the watch  bands.
reviews.content: Easy to set up, charges fast, excellent quality, many functions, easy to hear, looks very nice, easy to change band.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 12, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great tool for busy mom
reviews.author: Yuki
reviews.content: First time Apple Watch user and I am very happy with the purchase. As a mom of toddler, this is very helpful tool so that I get notification while my phone is inside stroller or diaper bag and chasing my child in the park. I also love the GPS and emergency notification that I can share with my family. I have started to work out little more and care for health as it encourage to stand up, track movement etc which is very helpful. I’m impressed with the battery life and how fast it charges too! I’ve been using iPhone since it came out and MacBook but Apple Watch was something I didn’t think I needed. It’s not something you need, but it is well worth investing to make your life easier. Watch quality and size is perfect for my arm and it is durable and water resistance so I don’t have to worry about it while playing in the splash pad or parks too!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 15, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice gift
reviews.author: Robert Vyse
reviews.content: The screen if a good size. The screen looks nice, a good quality and screen seems to be scratch proof
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 6, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it
reviews.author: My Milz
reviews.content: I’m still learning all of the functions. It is a replacement watch as the first one literally fell apart after several years. It is updated with different functions and some I miss from the older watch. The price point sold me, overall, I’m pleased. Not estatic.. .
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 4, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great watch
reviews.author: Shayna
reviews.content: Bought this to replace a Fit Bit, and purchased at a great price during Prime Days. Went to the Apple store for a free class and discovered that our teacher had the same watch. I don't need all the fancy things a watch can do these days - but at the right price, this is the same price as a Fit Bit and does so much more. My watch doesn't have cellular capability, so the phone has to be within 30-40 feet - but if I'm busy I can answer calls on it! Read messages, emails, keep track of steps, sleep; easily change watch faces to match mood or outfit. And, I can see the time and all writing outside in the sunlight. Great improvement over my last FitBit. Great product.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 17, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great!!
reviews.author: it is really fun and it is really good
reviews.content: I really love this watch and have been learning how to use all of the different tools available. I would definitely recommend it to anyone. The only downside is having to charge it every day, but it’s really not a big deal since I’m also charging my phone at the same time.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States August 3, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fiance Loves It
reviews.author: SunDevil03
reviews.content: My fiance has never had a smart watch and she would often talk about how cool it would be. But she doesn't make a ton of money so it's always been a bit of a pipe dream. Well her birthday came around and this watch was at a great price, so I had to pick it up for her. She absolutely loves it. Perfect functionality. It's not too big, but still big enough to be useful.Personally I'm a Samsung guy and I've got a Galaxy Watch that I love, but she sure loves her Apple Watch and so far it appears to be a big winner.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 9, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love Love
reviews.author: Michelle
reviews.content: Wanted to start out with a cheaper version of the watch to make sure I really like it. And I love it! I use it mostly for fitness and checking important notifications when I don't have my phone nearby. I also love the sleep tracker and the heart rate monitor. I see the other features that come with the other apple watch such as the airfib, which this one doesn't have. But I believe this is a good starter watch for those who may have never owned a smart watch like this. Then in the future you can upgrade if necessary.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 10, 2024

content.product_name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band S/M. Fitness & Sleep Tracker, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor

But one new, you won't regret it.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feeling up to date with my new Apple Watch

reviews.content: My new watch keeps me moving throughout my day. It tells me when I need to get up and move a bit.It lets me know who is calling without having to locate my cell phone.

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really liked it
reviews.author: Ana Carolina Araujo
reviews.content: As I recently changed to Apple from Samsung after years, the watch was a perfect addition. It does everything a watch should do and a little bit more. Simple and easy to use. Other designs that are too complicated and have a billion and one functions are ridiculous.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States October 1, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very useful; love the product
reviews.author: Kaela Luttrell
reviews.content: I bought the Apple Watch mainly to stay connected during office hours when I can't use my phone as much. But now, I find myself using it for so much more! It's awesome for my runs and workouts, keeping me on track with my fitness goals. The sleep tracking feature is super helpful, giving me insights into how well I'm actually sleeping. Plus, the reminders to stand up and move around every hour have been great for keeping me active, especially during long stretches at my desk. Overall, the Apple Watch has really become a go-to gadget for both work and staying healthy!
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 4, 2024

reviews.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Apple watch

reviews.content: I love my Apple Watch! I use it more often than I thought from alarms, timers, and quick texts. I love the updates.

reviews.content: I bought 2 Apple Watch SE off of Amazon. Both were brand new. Have loved having them for my wife and I.

content.product_name: Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Starlight Aluminum Case with Starlight Sport Band S/M. Fitness & Sleep Tracker, Crash Detection, Heart Rate Monitor

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great little watch except for one important thing
reviews.author: Roland Frymire
reviews.content: I’ve owned a couple of these Apple watches that are great products with the exception of one major problem. I have also purchased non-apple watches that cost much less that have had a much longer battery life than the Apple Watch. I don’t understand why the Apple Watch has a pathetic battery life wherein the much cheaper watches are Incredibly proficient in their battery life. The battery life for an Apple Watch is on the average is 24 hours wherein the other much less expensive non-Apple watches can go for days or even weeks. Shame on Apple.
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 1, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Watch
reviews.author: Kimberly Leksen
reviews.content: Nice watch however I’m still trying to figure some things out. I had a Fitbit versa 2 prior to this Apple Watch.Seems like my text messages are not received by my phone. Maybe I need a new iPhone I’m still using my old 11. And the battery life does dwindle quick. Otherwise it’s a super cute watch and has many options. I did talk on it and was able to answer my phone on the watch and the sound was awesome. 😎
reviews.timestamp: Reviewed in the United States September 3, 2024

reviews.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love it so far

reviews.content: This Apple Watch just arrived and so far it’s been great. The sports band is not my favorite as it pinches my skin when putting it on, but the color of it is still cute. The screen on the watch is brighter than I expected and the sensitivity of the watch face is lovely. I would recommend getting some sort of screen protector or a case because it does seem that maybe one good drop would crack it all up. But definitely recommended this watch! Not to big too which is what I was worried about.
